title: Germany Is Holding Syrian Officials Accountable For Alleged War Crimes
description: 10 years ago, when the Syrian regime sent tanks and warplanes to stop a an uprising, it sparked a bloody civil war that is still ongoing.

itunes:title: Germany Is Holding Syrian Officials Accountable For Alleged War Crimes
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Witnesses to a Syrian intelligence officer's alleged war crimes testify in landmark trial in Germany despite fears of retaliation.
itunes:subtitle: Witnesses to a Syrian intelligence officer's alleged war crimes testify in landmark trial in Germany despite fears of retaliation.
